mapper.sql: id, level_match, name_match, img_url, link_url, create_time, update_time, clicks, priority, start_time, end_time
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_match
id,
level_match,
name_match,
img_url,
link_url,
create_time,
update_time,
clicks,
priority,
start_time,
end_time,
introduce,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{levelMatch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{nameMatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{introduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tbl_match
level_match = #{levelMatch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name_match = #{nameMatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_match set level_match = #{levelMatch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name_match = #{nameMatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_match set level_match = #{levelMatch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name_match = #{nameMatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select tm.id,level_match,level_name, name_match, img_url, link_url, create_time, update_time, clicks, priority, start_time, end_time,
from tbl_match tm,tbl_levels tl where tm.level_match = tl.id

select tm.id,level_match,level_name, name_match, img_url, link_url, create_time, update_time, clicks, priority, start_time, end_time,
from tbl_match tm,tbl_levels tl where tm.level_match = tl.id ORDER BY priority DESC LIMIT #{counts}
